casebody.data:
JOHNSON
v.
SHAKER HTS. MUN. COURT. 2016-1394 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 28, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Connor, C.J., and O'Donnell, Kennedy, French, Fischer, DeWine, and DeGenaro, JJ., concur.

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus. On motion for judgment on pleadings. Motion granted. Cause dismissed.
